pageContext.claim: “This was really a hoax created largely by the Democrats as a way of softening the blow of a loss, which is a loss that, frankly, they shouldn't have had from the standpoint that it's very easy for them.”
pageContext.analysis: The Democrats did not create the Russian probe as a hoax; it was started as a counterintelligence investigation after the FBI received a tip from Australia that a Trump campaign official appeared to know that Russia had hacked Democratic emails before they were released.
